entry.title: [EU][Customer Panel][Order funnel][API] - Backend maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 16, 22:30 UTC  -  Jan 17, 08:00 UTC

Jan 5, 07:34 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 16/01/2023 22:30 UTC
End time : 17/01/2023 08:00 UTC
Service Impact : OVHcloud will operate a maintenance on its internal infrastructure to improve its reliability.
Service Improvement : During the maintenance, some services such as Customer panel, Order funnel, api.ovh.com, and some features (service administration, billing and payment processes) will be disturbed.

entry.title: [EU][Customer Panel][Order funnel] - Backend maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 10, 07:00 - 09:00 UTC

Jan 5, 06:50 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 10/01/2023 07:00 UTC
End time : 10/01/2023 09:00 UTC
Service Impact : During the maintenance, Customer panel or order funnel browsing might be disturbed.
Service Improvement : OVHcloud will operate a maintenance of the customer panel's and order funnel's backend to improve the reliability of the services.

entry.title: [EU][API] - New Service IP for OVHcloud API
entry.content:
Jan 3, 09:12 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jan 3, 08:31 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 2, 12:05 UTC
Update - The current maintenance will be carried out as follows.
Start time : 03/01/2023 08:30 UTC
End time : 03/01/2023 09:00 UTC

Dec 2, 09:11 UTC
Scheduled - Following a coordination point with our teams, we will post a next update before each operation (minimum 24h each intervention). Please note that you must have made the connection changes as soon as possible to avoid any disruption in your services

Dec 1, 00:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 27, 16:48 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/01/2023 07:00 UTC
End time : 03/01/2023 15:00 UTC
Service impact : During the migration, connection might be reset for one minute.
Service improvement : OVHcloud will change the service IP for its APIs (api.ovh.com, eu.api.ovh.com, eu.api.soyoustart.com, eu.api.kimsufi.com).
Customers using the OVHcloud APIs must verify that their outgoing firewalls is allowing connection to the new service IP: 141.95.186.223, on port 443.

entry.title: [CA/EU][Customer Service] - Renewal services
entry.content:
Dec 6, 14:19 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 03/12/2022 15:30 UTC
End Time : 05/12/2022 14:51 UTC
Service impact : Customers who are under manual renewal were not able to renew their expired services.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 5, 11:18 UTC
Update - Update : Our teams are still working on a fix.
Workaround : Our teams have set up a temporary fix that allows you to renew your services. Only IPs will not be renewed.

Dec 3, 18:19 UTC
Identified - Start time : 03/12/2022 15:30 UTC
Service impact : Customers who are under manual renewal are not able to renew their expired services.
Ongoing actions : The problem is identified, until the patch is applied the affected services will not be suspended.

Dec 3, 17:56 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 03/12/2022 15:30 UTC
Service impact : Customers who are under manual renewal are not able to renew their expired services.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

End time : 24/11/2022 22:30 UTCÂ 
Service impact :Â Â 
The New Help Center (Beta) will be temporarily unavailable.
For any request use the address : https://help.ovhcloud.com to find an on-line answer to your question.Â 
To create a ticket from your customer panel: https://www.ovh.com/manager/#/dedicated/support/tickets. Please note that tickets might take longer time to be processed during the maintenance period.
